== Main inclusion report for libopenobex ==

Author: Jonathan Riddell

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libo/libopenobex1.0/
2. ''Rationale:'' Required for bluetooth support in KDE and Gnome

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: Library, no user configuration needed
* Library has been little changed since 1.0 release in 2003 http://openobex.sourceforge.net/
* Bugs: 
** 7 open bugs according to http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=8960&atid=208960 but bug tracker looks unmaintained
** No bugs in Ubuntu bugzilla.
** No bugs in Malone.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* debian/rules uses "Colin's Build System"
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.

6. ''Dependencies:'' 
* rdepends kdebluetooth <nowiki>[[MainInclusionReportKDEBluetooth]]</nowiki>  and in future gnome-bluetooth

=== Reviewers ===

MattZimmerman: Approved
